        public int[] coordinates(int index)
        Calculates the coordinates on the board for a given index.
        Parameters:
        index, - index of the field on the board
        Returns:

        z, - z-coordinate

      • gameOver

        public boolean gameOver()
        Returns true if one of the marks on the board has won the game, or the board is full.
        Returns:
        true of X or O has won the game, or no more move can be made.

      • fall

        public int fall(int move)
        Makes a move fall. e.g. gets the fallen position for a move.
        Parameters:
        move - the move in the x,y plane (index)
        Returns:
        the index of the fallen place, or -1 if the vertical bar is full already and no move is possible here.
